job.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Staffing and Recruiting
job.description: Full-Stack Software Engineer<br><br>Dedham MA - Hybrid<br><br>Full-time<br><br>Senior Full Stack Software Engineer will contribute to the design and build of software architecture and product suite and must have an understanding of large-scale, real-time integrations with external systems and user facing applications. Please send an update resume to Chris McMillan at cmcmillan@alexandertg.com<br><br><strong><u>The Role<br></u></strong><ul><li> A hands-on contributor for the development of full application stack and bring best practices to coding, performance, release, testing and automation.</li><li> Utilize cloud-native architectures to deliver resilient, high-availability services</li><li> Work on definition and execution of security standards and compliance<br></li></ul><strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul><li> 5+ year of full-stack scale web application development</li><li> 2+ of architecture exp.</li><li> AWS experience</li><li> Must have React.js experience</li><li> Experience with Python, JavaScript, Node.js</li><li> Built scalable RESTful APIs with a framework i.e. Django, Falcon, Flask, Spring Boot</li><li> Experience with SQL and relational databases (Aurura DB/MySQL)<br></li></ul>Please send an updated resume to Chris McMillan at cmcmillan@alexandertg.com<br><br>*MONATG*<br><br>ATG456<br><br>
